Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    asteroids.part3.programs.internal.generated.AsteroidsProgramParser.tokenNames
    Use AsteroidsProgramParser.VOCABULARY instead.
    asteroids.part3.programs.internal.generated.AsteroidsProgramLexer.tokenNames
    Use AsteroidsProgramLexer.VOCABULARY instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    asteroids.part2.facade.IFacade.createShip()
    Since part 2 of the project. The method description (unit circle) was inconsistent with the constraints described in the assignment (minimum radius).
    asteroids.part2.facade.IFacade.createShip(double, double, double, double, double, double)
    Since part 2 of the project. This behavior is now triggered through the IFacade.createShip(double, double, double, double, double, double, double) method (which includes the mass as an additional parameter).
    asteroids.part3.programs.internal.generated.AsteroidsProgramParser.getTokenNames()
    asteroids.part3.programs.internal.generated.AsteroidsProgramLexer.getTokenNames()
    asteroids.part2.facade.IFacade.move(Ship, double)
    Since part 2 of the project. This behavior is now triggered through the IFacade.evolve(World, double, CollisionListener) method.
    asteroids.tests.Part1OwnTests.testThrust()
    asteroids.tests.Part1OwnTests.testThrustIllegal()
    asteroids.part2.facade.IFacade.thrust(Ship, double)
    Since part 2 of the project. This behavior is now triggered through the combination of IFacade.setThrusterActive(Ship, boolean) and IFacade.evolve(World, double, CollisionListener) methods.
